name: DINNERDINNNER
description:
"DINNERDINNNER" is a horror adventure game set in the modern era.

◆ Story

You are a staff member at "DINNERDINNNER." Throughout the morning, afternoon, and evening, you encounter various people and strange events. Customers with bizarre stories, those engaging in trivial conversations, and others discussing incomprehensible matters. The town is filled with peculiarities, and you find it quite unsettling. Nevertheless, you must continue living your life.

◆ Game Features

Walking triggers various events, creating a walking simulator experience.

Examine objects to advance the story.

There are no quest markers or time constraints, allowing for a relaxed gameplay experience.

A storyline without significant ups and downs.

Playtime: 10 to 20 minutes.

◆Video Streaming Guidelines

・Regardless of whether you are an individual or a business entity, streaming is allowed without the need for permission.
